title: I Made $73,000 Last Year on Amazon from This KDP Niche Research Method.....
description:

As a high-volume seller with hundreds of thousands of units in sales, Chris Raydog shares his exact, no filter results and strategies for launching profitable products through Amazon Kindle Direct Publishing.

A look at how to REALLY do niche research...

In today's video I take  a look at my niche research method for Amazon kdp low and medium content books -- this will be a raw and live video of me finding 'hot' niches and I also talk about the untold factor of niche research!
